short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly convert your open tabs to bookmarks. Automatically detects tab groups and creates subfolders in bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a small utility I built to quickly convert open tabs & tab groups into bookmarks as a way of saving tabs between devices. Chrome's built-in tab-syncing is great, but tabs need to be open and active to show up, and then opened individually on the second device. This extension quickly creates a bookmark folder with bookmarks or subfolders for tabs and tab groups, respectively.
